title: "I Don't Like the Math We're Doing" - with Neal Powell
itunes:title: "I Don't Like the Math We're Doing" - with Neal Powell
description:
This week we're taking a bite out of some of the crunchier rules with DM advice from the co-host of the Dungeon Master's Block, Neil Powell. Join us as we discuss flexibility with the core rules to ensure narrative pay off, plus, in true Black Halfling fashion, incorporating diversity as a white DM & exploring DnD's messy history with religion.


If you enjoy this podcast please help us out by leaving a review and sharing with your fellow adventurers.

Support us on Patreon at patreon.com/tbhalflings for your Shirefolk Shoutout and Bonus Episodes.

Connect with us on Twitter, Instagram and Facebook @tbhalflings, on our Discord or email secondbreakfast@tbhalflings.com
